projects.name: Understanding Prespective Change in Immersive Data Storytelling with Spatial Context
projects.summary: We simulated spatial-related data storytelling in Virual Reality (VR) using Unity3D game engine and compared active vs. passive reader perspective change in story progress control.

projects.name: Civic Dark Patterns in Public Record Portals

projects.name: Mixplorer: A Mixed-Reality Object Placement Data Collection Tool
projects.summary: We created a mixed-reality object placement data collection tool, instantiating human-in-the-loop human-AI collaboration where AI provides suggestions and users modify the suggestions for model improvement.
